title: Do inmates receive COVID-19 incentive checks?
subtitle: Tom Cotton wrote that Dzikhar Tsarnaev, the man responsible for the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, would also receive a check as part of a relief bill.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Inmates, including those convicted of murder such as Dzukar Tsarnaev, will receive incentive relief checks as part of the last COVID-19 relief bill in March 2021.
